result.purpose: This folder/module is responsible for providing a client and configuration setup for interacting with the BlockAid API and handling blockchain asset validation.
result.architecture: The folder follows a modular architecture pattern, encapsulating functionality related to the BlockAid API and blockchain interactions within distinct files, promoting separation of concerns.

internal/infras/blockaid/blockaid.go.purpose: This file provides a configuration and client setup for interacting with the BlockAid API.

internal/infras/blockaid/client.go.purpose: Implements a client for interacting with a blockchain RPC service.

internal/infras/blockaid/models.go.purpose: Defines data structures and types for handling blockchain asset validation and features.

internal/infras/blockaid/models_test.go.purpose: Unit tests for JSON unmarshalling of TokenID type.
